tasks.label: Build and Run Current File (Debug)
tasks.command:
REL_PATH=$(python3 -c "import os.path; print(os.path.relpath('${file}', '${workspaceFolder}/src'))") && DIR=$(dirname $REL_PATH) && FILENAME=$(basename ${file} .cc) && if [ "$DIR" != "." ]; then TARGET=$(echo $DIR | tr '/' '_')_${FILENAME}; else TARGET=${FILENAME}; fi && cmake -B build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug > /dev/null && cmake --build build --target $TARGET && echo '
========== Running ==========
' && ./build/$TARGET

tasks.label: Build Current File (Debug)
tasks.command: REL_PATH=$(python3 -c "import os.path; print(os.path.relpath('${file}', '${workspaceFolder}/src'))") && DIR=$(dirname $REL_PATH) && FILENAME=$(basename ${file} .cc) && if [ "$DIR" != "." ]; then TARGET=$(echo $DIR | tr '/' '_')_${FILENAME}; else TARGET=${FILENAME}; fi && cmake -B build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug > /dev/null && cmake --build build --target $TARGET && ln -sf $(pwd)/build/$TARGET $(pwd)/build/.current_debug
